abstract: The chief adviser to several of the CIT Group’s largest bondholders derided Carl C. Icahn’s pitch to small investors in the company as one of desperation and an attempt to buy votes.

lead_paragraph: Update | 5:45 p.m. Not so fast, Carl.

headline.main: Bondholder Adviser Derides Icahn’s CIT Offer
